description: Configuration for alleyway rooms and exploration

entrance.title: Dark Alley Entrance
entrance.description: You stand at the entrance of a dark alleyway. The streetlights cast long shadows, and you can hear distant sounds echoing off the walls.

dead_end.title: Dead End
dead_end.description: You reach a dead end with graffiti-covered walls. There's nothing here but trash and shadows.

side_street.title: Side Street
side_street.description: You emerge onto a narrow side street. Cars occasionally drive by, and you see a few shady figures watching you.

dumpster.title: Behind the Dumpster
dumpster.description: You hide behind a large dumpster. The smell is awful, but you're well concealed. You find some discarded items.

hidden_entrance.title: Hidden Entrance
hidden_entrance.description: You find a hidden entrance to an underground network. This could lead to interesting places...

underground.title: Underground Passage
underground.description: You descend into a dimly lit underground passage. Water drips from the ceiling, and you hear echoes of distant footsteps.

secret_room.title: Secret Room
secret_room.description: You enter a secret room filled with old crates and mysterious artifacts. There might be valuable items here.
